servermod.settings.title: Server Mod
servermod.message.cachecleared: Skin cache cleared and reloaded all loaded skin.
servermod.message.uploadalready: Same file is already uploading now.
servermod.command.reloaded: All player refreshed all cached skin.
servermod.command.error.cantexecuteentit: This command must be executed by player entity.
servermod.schematic.invalid: [!] Invalid Item - Use the Schematic Table instead
servermod.schematic.tool.deploy.descript: Moves the structure to a location.
Right-Click on the ground to place.
Hold [Ctrl] to select at a fixed distance.
servermod.schematic.tool.move.descriptio: Point at the Schematic and [Ctrl]-Scroll to push it.
servermod.schematic.tool.rotate.descript: Rotates the Schematic around its center.
servermod.schematic.tool.print.descripti: Instantly places the structure in the world.
[Right-Click] to confirm placement at the current location.
This tool is for Creative Mode only.
servermod.schematic.tool.flip.descriptio: Flips the Schematic along the face you select.
Point at the Schematic and [Ctrl]-Scroll to flip it.
servermod.schematic.tool.toggleair.descr: Toggles whether or not to include air when printing.
[Right-Click] to toggle whether air is included or not.
If it is §2"green"§r, it contains air.
If it is §c"red"§r, it prints without air.
